title: Suananda Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, International, Juice bar, Ayurvedic
description: Little garden cafe at the back of Suananda Wellness center, tucked in an alley steps from the Myanmar embassy. Serves traditional Indian as well an a la carte menu of international food. Cooking is based on the Ayurvedic principle. Beverages include Ayurvedic tea, fresh juices, saffron & almond milkshake. Staff speak English. Opened since Mar 2013.
